schema.title: 企业标识，也称企业id，字符串形式，可在云效访问链接中获取，如https://devops.aliyun.com/organization/【OrganizationId】
schema.description: 企业标识，也称企业id，字符串形式，可在云效访问链接中获取，如https://devops.aliyun.com/organization/【OrganizationId】

requestId.title: 请求id，每次请求都是唯一值，便于后续排查问题
requestId.description: 请求id，每次请求都是唯一值，便于后续排查问题

success.title: true 接口调用成功，false 接口调用失败
success.description: true 接口调用成功，false 接口调用失败
success.example: true 接口调用成功，false 接口调用失败

400.errorMessage: No cluster is available to generate the workspace.
The parameter codeUrl is invalid. SVN is not supported.
No resource is found. You cannot create the workspace. Please try again later.
The user that is invoking the API service is not a registered user.
The resource member does not exist.
The user is not in the organization.
The workspace status is invalid. You can only operate workspaces with the SUCCESS status.
The parameter workspaceTemplate is not found.

403.errorMessage: The user is not authorized to perform the operation.
The current user is not an admin or owner in the organization and is not authorized to perform the operation.
The user is not in the organization and is not authorized to perform the operation.

404.errorMessage: The pipeline execution instance is not found.
The current user is not in the organization and has no permission to operate.
